column4: No, it'll write over your Windows bootloader (if it's still there and which you don't want to keep) with GRUB.
/dev/sda5 won't be touched unless you tell something to do so
ok so i should choose "/dev/sda ATA WDC3200AAJS-6 (320.1 gb)" and the ntfs drive wont be changed? :) just need to make sure, because if that get's deleted my whole life will be xD
Are you on the ubuntu installer just now?
